org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.cache

Class CachingH2AsyncClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.async.H2AsyncClientBuilder
      • org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.cache.CachingH2AsyncClientBuilder

  • @Experimental
public class CachingH2AsyncClientBuilder
extends H2AsyncClientBuilder
    Builder for HTTP/2 CloseableHttpAsyncClient instances capable of client-side caching.
    Since:
    5.0
